backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to touched files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files used in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML shell including boot fallback UI, metadata tags, and build ID for runtime diagnostics.
frontend/public/health.html: Static no-JavaScript health check page showing build ID and connectivity guidance.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring ThemeProvider, Web3 provider, ErrorBoundary, and dispatching an app-mounted event.
frontend/src/components/BalanceView.tsx: Component displaying BNB and token balances with refresh, live updates toggle, cache clearing, and valuation support.
frontend/src/components/ContractInfo.tsx: Displays contract address, owner, and network info with copy-to-clipboard and BscScan link features.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: Handles depositing tokens into the vault, including token selection, validation, balance display, and transaction history integration.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsBar.t: Shows build and environment metadata and provides buttons to copy diagnostics and performance data to the clipboard.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Catches runtime React errors and displays a recovery UI with error details and a reload option.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the application footer with build info, branding, and external link attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding and a theme toggle button.
frontend/src/components/TokenSelectorInp: Provides a token selection input with dropdown options or manual entry, including validation and UI switching modes.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays local transaction history with status badges, hash/address shortening, BscScan links, and a clear-history action.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnect.ts: Handles wallet connection flow, network switching, and mobile/desktop fallback instructions for MetaMask and other EVM wallets.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: Provides UI and logic for withdrawing BNB or tokens, validating inputs, executing withdrawals, and logging transactions.
frontend/src/global.d.ts: Extends the Window type with Ethereum provider fields for MetaMask compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous Internet Computer actor, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
Fetches BNB and token prices, computes USD/BNB valuations, and tracks loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login flow, stored identities, and provides related context to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating Web3 replaces backend queries.
Manages a localStorage-backed map of token addresses to labels, providing add/update/remove operations and fallback labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenMetadataCache: Caches token metadata in localStorage with versioning to reduce repeated RPC calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useTxHistory.ts: Stores and updates transaction history in localStorage and polls for status updates via provider or RPC.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultBalances.ts: Fetches and caches BNB and token balances from the vault, including token metadata and periodic polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultInfo.ts: Retrieves and exposes the vault owner's address with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultOperations.ts: Provides deposit and withdrawal operations for BNB and tokens using encoded contract calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchedTokens.ts: Manages a normalized, validated list of watched token addresses persisted to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3.tsx: Provides a React context for Web3 wallet state, connection, chain switching, contract calls, and error handling with MetaMask and BSC support.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes, accessibility styles, and mobile touch utilities.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exports build metadata and helpers to retrieve build identifier, version, date, and deployed build ID from a meta tag.
frontend/src/lib/contracts.ts: Defines contract addresses and call encoders/decoders for EVM methods, including parameter encoding and result parsing.
frontend/src/lib/evm.ts: Contains low-level EVM helpers for encoding/decoding uint256 and addresses, plus unit parsing/formatting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/evmAbiText.ts: Implements browser-friendly decoding of ABI-encoded strings and ERC‑20 metadata such as symbol and name.
frontend/src/lib/performanceCheck.ts: Collects build and browser performance metrics and formats them into a readable text report.
frontend/src/lib/prices.ts: Fetches BNB and token prices from CoinGecko and provides formatting and token mapping utilities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a class name merge helper combining clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: React dashboard page that manages Web3 connection state, displays vault balances, and provides deposit/withdraw operations using tabs and various UI components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project’s state, known issues, and existing feature requirements for deployment stability and diagnostics improvements.
